comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: We do not set the PATH when installing through HomeBrew. It seems like it should be filed as an issue for HomeBrew.

comments.author: iMonZ
comments.body:
> We do not set the PATH when installing through HomeBrew. It seems like it should be filed as an issue for HomeBrew.

After PowerShell installer is run it installs itself to a non regularly directory. Thus a Path must be set.
This is the job of the PowerShell installer and not HomeBrew. Except if PowerShell was a formula but this is a cask with a proprietary installer.
